# Metadefender Core

## Key facts

* MSG Format based filter
* Legacy BSD Format default port 514

## Links

| Ref            | Link                                                                                                    |
|----------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Splunk Add-on  | None                                    |
| Product Manual | https://www.opswat.com/docs/mdcore/configuration/syslog-message-format  |

| avi:events        | None                                                                                                    |
